metadata.title: RHSA-2019:3168: wget security update (Important)
metadata.description:
The wget packages provide the GNU Wget file retrieval utility for HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP protocols.

Security Fix(es):

* wget: do_conversion() heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2019-5953)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: wget: do_conversion() heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 Advanced Update Support

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
wget is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
